file.name: ExportConfigAPI.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8080/ScadaBR/api'
    description: 'Scada development Server'
    variables: {}
info:
  version: 2.5.3
  title: Scada-LTS API
  description: 'Scada-LTS OpenAPI Specification. Description contains only export config API'
  termsOfService: ''
  contact:
    name: 'Kamil Jarmusik - SoftQ Developer'
    email: 'kamil.jarmusik@gmail.com'
  license:
    name: 'GPL-2.0'
paths:
  /export/config/:
      get:
        tags:
          - ExportConfigAPI
        summary: 'Get zip file with configuration system'
        description: 'It enables precise configuration of the export in query. None of the parameters are required.'
        operationId: 'export'
        parameters:
          - name: 'projectName'
            in: 'query'
            required: false
            schema:
              type: 'string'
              default: 'From system'
              nullable: true
          - name: 'projectDescription'
            in: 'query'
            required: false
            schema:
              type: 'string'
              default: ''
          - name: 'pointValuesMax'
            in: 'query'
            required: false
            schema:
              type: 'integer'
              default: 100
          - name: 'includeUploadFolder'
            in: 'query'
            required: false
            schema:
              type: 'boolean'
              default: false
          - name: 'includeGraphicalFolder'
            in: 'query'
            required: false
            schema:
              type: 'boolean'
              default: false
        responses:
          '200':
            description: "Get successful"
            headers: {}
components:
  parameters:
    Authorization:
      name: Authorization
      in: header
      required: true
      style: simple
      schema:
        type: string
        example: Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4=
      description: ''
security: []
externalDocs:
  url: ''
  description: ''
